name: x402TechAudit
description: Scan entire x402chat codebase and output full dependency, env var, secret, and system requirement analysis.

instructions: Parse package.json, lockfiles, peer deps, missing deps.
Map imports across all TS/JS code.
Detect unused, missing, or mismatched imports.
Detect Node version, TS config, build tools.
Scan for RPC, TURN, API keys.
Check SPL-token, web3.js, wallet adapters, ICE server config.
Report unused deps, deprecated calls, inconsistent versions.
Generate bash script, requirements, onboarding steps.
